ADPCM.name: ADPCM
ADPCM.description: Verilog & Matlab implementation of adaptive differential pulse code modulation for audio compression.

SINGLE_PROCESSOR.name: Single-Cycle MIPS Microprocessor
SINGLE_PROCESSOR.description: Verilog implementation of a Harvard MIPS Single-Cycle Microprocessor.

MULTI_PROCESSOR.name: Multi-Cycle MIPS Microprocessor
MULTI_PROCESSOR.description: Verilog implementation of a Von Neumann MIPS Multi-Cycle Microprocessor.

PIPELINE_PROCESSOR.name: Super-Scalar Pipelined MIPS Microprocessor
PIPELINE_PROCESSOR.description: Verilog implementation of a Harvard MIPS Super-Scalar 5-Staged Pipelined Microprocessor with Data & Control Hazard Error Handling.

TIME_MUX_FIR.name: Time-Multiplexed FIR Filter
TIME_MUX_FIR.description: Verilog & Matlab implementation of a Time-Multiplexed FIR Filter.

IIR.name: IIR Filter
IIR.description: Verilog & Matlab implementation of an IIR Filter using Cascaded Second Order Section.

Digital_Clock.name: Digital Clock
Digital_Clock.description: SystemVerilog & Basys 3 FPGA implementation of a Digital Clock with an Alarm.

Whack_A_Mole.name: Whack-A-Mole
Whack_A_Mole.description: SystemVerilog & Basys 3 FPGA implementation of a Whack-A-Mole game with scoring system and timer.

ARGUS.name: A.R.G.U.S.
ARGUS.description: Deployable Surveillance M-203 Grenade Launcher Round with seismic sensing, camera, microphone, gps, sd card, wifi capabilities. Data is sent via file transfer protocol to a fog computing layer that processes data and transmits to the MySQL server in cloud. Data can be viewed an accessed by the user in a Flask Web-Application.

AASE.name: Autonomous Adaptive Solar Ecosystem
AASE.description: SD Hacks 2022 Best Overall. Single-Axis Adaptive Solar Panels with Liquid Cooling Pump System and Data Tracking via MySQL & Flask Web Application.

CheezyPop.name: CheezyPop
CheezyPop.description: SD Hacks 2022 Best Overall. Single-Axis Adaptive Solar Panels with Liquid Cooling Pump System and Data Tracking via MySQL & Flask Web Application.
